column2: Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), The Elections Lab Facebook Page (https://web.facebook.com/electionslab)

Ethnic Composition File (showing Malay, Chinese, Indians, Bumiputera Sabah, Bumiputera Sarawak, Orang Asli, and Others) - which originated from EC - and Ethnic Composition according to The Elections Lab cannot be compared with each other directly (due to different intepretations for ethnic classification). Data from The Elections Lab doesn't tally up to 100% nor there is complete dataset for all 73 DUN constituencies. All data points are expressed as percentages. Mandatory citations should be given to the sources. While every effort has been made to ensure accuracy and completeness of the dataset, TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the dataset.
